sentences.en: Creditors were also jumpy: the price of insuring Aviva's bonds against default soared.
sentences.cn: 英杰 华债券的违约保险价格迅速飙升,债主们对此感到焦躁不安.

sentences.en: He just has to keep moving or he gets bored, nervous and jumpy.
sentences.cn: 他不会定下来,要麽他们便会感到沉闷, 紧张及神经质.

sentences.en: I am jumpy, anxious or out on the edge right before my date picks me up.
sentences.cn: 我的男朋友来接我以前,我总是很紧张, 也很焦急,而且还坐立不安.

sentences.en: I knew that something was going to happen, and I was very jumpy.
sentences.cn: 我知道要出事了, 心里很紧张.

sentences.en: I told myself not to be so jumpy.
sentences.cn: 我告诉自己别这么提心吊胆的。

sentences.en: It was beginning to make him very jumpy.
sentences.cn: 这使他开始感到心神不安.

sentences.en: Mary, who has been nervous and jumpy lately, suddenly burst into tears.
sentences.cn: 玛丽最近一直很紧张, 很容易激动;她突然大哭起来.

sentences.en: Parrot: I'm always a little bit jumpy when I walk by the graveyard at night.
sentences.cn: 我晚上走过墓地的时候,总事有点害怕(口语: 发毛).

sentences.en: She was jumpy during her job interview because she was so nervous.
sentences.cn: 她在应征面谈的时候心惊肉跳,因为她太紧张了.

sentences.en: So what else is making investors jumpy, besides growth and inflation?
sentences.cn: 除了经济增长和通胀,是什么让投资者变得神经过敏?

sentences.en: The jumpy mother always cross with her children.
sentences.cn: 这个神经质的母亲老是对孩子发脾气.

sentences.en: The refugees are still jumpy, although they are now in safety.
sentences.cn: 难民们虽然已经到了安全地带,但还是战战兢兢的.

sentences.en: This is just the sort of news that makes oil traders jumpy.
sentences.cn: 这正是这类使油商人心惊肉跳的新闻.

sentences.en: We felt jumpy after she told us the house was haunted.
sentences.cn: 在她告诉我们这屋子闹鬼之后,我们就觉得神经兮兮的.

sentences.en: When he spoke his voice was jumpy.
sentences.cn: 他说话的时候声音听起来很紧张。

words.tran_cn: 跳高运动员；跳跃者；工作服；妇女穿的套头外衣

trans.tran_cn: 心惊肉跳的，易于激动或受惊吓的
trans.tran_en: worried or nervous, especially because you are expecting something bad to happen
